title: Love Island Australia 2019: Where to find all the cast on Instagram
text:
Love Island Australia returns Monday, October 7th for its second season. It promises to be just as dramatic as the first.

A group of 11, scantily clad hopefuls will embark on their search for love — and the possibility of winning a giant wad of cash — when Love Island Australia returns for its second season tonight.

Airing on Nine at 8.45pm, the reality show — hosted by ex-Bachelorette Sophie Monk and narrated by Irish comedian Eoghan McDermott — follows a group of half-naked contestants, who to survive in their luxury tropical villa must be coupled up with another Islander at all times in order to receive the $50,000 prize at the end.

RELATED: How the Love Island villa is built

Viewers can expect plenty of sun, romance and steamy hook-ups along the way if the social media accounts of this year’s contestants are anything to go by.

Here’s where to find the 2019 cast — and all of their hot photos — on social media. Go forth — follow, like and enjoy the stalk.

RELATED: The Love Island Australia season two cast has been announced
